parameters.sign: sign of error, positive or negative (pp / nn).
parameters.error: size of error (MM / SS / LX / XL).
parameters.magn:
wind strength (Light / Medium / Strong /
Out of Range).
parameters.use: use the autolander or not. (auto / noauto.)

title: Space Shuttle Autolander Problem
description:
Description
The shuttle data frame has 256 rows and 7 columns.
The first six columns are categorical variables giving example
conditions; the seventh is the decision.  The first 253 rows are the
training set, the last 3 the test conditions.
reference:
D. Michie (1989)
Problems of computer-aided concept formation. In
Applications of Expert Systems 2,
ed. J. R. Quinlan, Turing Institute Press / Addison-Wesley, pp. 310–333.
format: This data frame contains the following factor columns:
